20 template<typename Scalar, typename Index>
21 class PointVisitationFunctor: public Celltree<Scalar, Index>::VisitFunctor {
22  typedef vistle::Celltree<Scalar, Index> Celltree;
23  typedef typename Celltree::VisitFunctor VisitFunctor;
24  typedef typename VisitFunctor::Order Order;
25  public:
26  PointVisitationFunctor(const Vector &point)
27  : m_point(point) {
28  }
29 
30  bool checkBounds(const Scalar *min, const Scalar *max) {
31 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
32  std::cerr << "checkBounds: min: "
33  << min[0] << " " << min[1] << " " << min[2]
34  << ", max: " << max[0] << " " << max[1] << " " << max[2] << std::endl;
35 #endif
36  for (int i=0; i<3; ++i) {
37  if (min[i] > m_point[i])
38  return false;
39  if (max[i] < m_point[i])
40  return false;
41  }
42  return true;
43  }
44 
45  Order operator()(const typename Celltree::Node &node) {
46 
47 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
48  std::cerr << "visit subtree: Lmax: " << node.Lmax << ", Rmin: " << node.Rmin << std::endl;
49 #endif
50 
51  const Scalar c = m_point[node.dim];
52  if (c > node.Lmax && c < node.Rmin)
53  return VisitFunctor::None;
54  if (c < node.Rmin) {
55  return VisitFunctor::Left;
56  }
57  if (c > node.Lmax) {
58  return VisitFunctor::Right;
59  }
60 
61  const Scalar mean = Scalar(0.5) * (node.Lmax + node.Rmin);
62  if (c < mean) {
63  return VisitFunctor::LeftRight;
64  } else {
65  return VisitFunctor::RightLeft;
66  }
67  }
68 
69  private:
70  Vector m_point;
71 };
72 
73 template<typename Scalar, typename Index>
74 class LineVisitationFunctor: public Celltree<Scalar, Index>::VisitFunctor {
75  typedef vistle::Celltree<Scalar, Index> Celltree;
76  typedef typename Celltree::VisitFunctor VisitFunctor;
77  typedef typename VisitFunctor::Order Order;
78  public:
79  LineVisitationFunctor(const Vector &p0, const Vector &p1)
80  : m_p0(p0)
81  , m_p1(p1)
82  {
83  }
84 
85  bool checkBounds(const Scalar *min, const Scalar *max) {
86 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
87  std::cerr << "checkBounds: min: "
88  << min[0] << " " << min[1] << " " << min[2]
89  << ", max: " << max[0] << " " << max[1] << " " << max[2] << std::endl;
90 #endif
91  for (int i=0; i<3; ++i) {
92  if (min[i] > m_p0[i] && min[i] > m_p1[i])
93  return false;
94  if (max[i] < m_p0[i] && max[i] < m_p1[i])
95  return false;
96  }
97  return true;
98  }
99 
100  Order operator()(const typename Celltree::Node &node) {
101 
102 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
103  std::cerr << "visit subtree: Lmax: " << node.Lmax << ", Rmin: " << node.Rmin << std::endl;
104 #endif
105 
106  const Scalar c0 = m_p0[node.dim];
107  const Scalar c1 = m_p1[node.dim];
108  if (c0 > node.Lmax && c0 < node.Rmin && c1 > node.Lmax && c1 < node.Rmin)
109  return VisitFunctor::None;
110  if (c0 < node.Rmin && c1 < node.Rmin) {
111  return VisitFunctor::Left;
112  }
113  if (c0 > node.Lmax && c1 > node.Lmax) {
114  return VisitFunctor::Right;
115  }
116 
117  const Scalar mean = Scalar(0.5) * (node.Lmax + node.Rmin);
118  const Scalar c = Scalar(0.5) * (c0 + c1);
119  if (c < mean) {
120  return VisitFunctor::LeftRight;
121  } else {
122  return VisitFunctor::RightLeft;
123  }
124  }
125 
126  private:
127  Vector m_p0, m_p1;
128 };
129 
130 template<typename Scalar, typename Index>
131 struct CellBoundsFunctor: public Celltree<Scalar, Index>::CellBoundsFunctor {
132 
133  CellBoundsFunctor(const GridInterface *grid)
134  : m_grid(grid)
135  {}
136 
137  bool operator()(Index elem, Vector *min, Vector *max) const {
138 
139  auto b = m_grid->cellBounds(elem);
140  *min = b.first;
141  *max = b.second;
142  return true;
143  }
144 
145  const GridInterface *m_grid;
146 };

149 template<class Grid, typename Scalar, typename Index>
150 class PointInclusionFunctor: public Celltree<Scalar, Index>::LeafFunctor {
151 
152  public:
153  PointInclusionFunctor(const Grid *grid, const Vector &point, bool acceptGhost=false)
154  : m_grid(grid)
155  , m_point(point)
156  , m_acceptGhost(acceptGhost)
157  , cell(InvalidIndex)
158  {
159  }
160 
161  bool operator()(Index elem) {
162 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
163  std::cerr << "PointInclusionFunctor: checking cell: " << elem << std::endl;
164 #endif
165  if (m_acceptGhost || !m_grid->isGhostCell(elem)) {
166  if (m_grid->inside(elem, m_point)) {
167 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
168  std::cerr << "PointInclusionFunctor: found cell: " << elem << std::endl;
169 #endif
170  cell = elem;
171  return false; // stop traversal
172  }
173  }
174  return true;
175  }
176  const Grid *m_grid;
177  Vector m_point;
178  bool m_acceptGhost;
179  Index cell;
180 
181 };
182 
183 template<class Grid, typename Scalar, typename Index>
184 class LineIntersectionFunctor: public Celltree<Scalar, Index>::LeafFunctor {
185 
186  public:
187  LineIntersectionFunctor(const Grid *grid, const Vector &p0, const Vector &p1, bool acceptGhost=false)
188  : m_grid(grid)
189  , m_p0(p0)
190  , m_dir(p1-p0)
191  , m_acceptGhost(acceptGhost)
192  {
193  }
194 
195  bool operator()(Index elem) {
196 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
197  std::cerr << "LineIntersectionFunctor: checking cell: " << elem << std::endl;
198 #endif
199  if (m_acceptGhost || !m_grid->isGhostCell(elem)) {
200  if (m_grid->cellNumFaces() != 1)
201  return true;
202  auto verts = m_grid->cellVertices(elem);
203  Index nCorners = verts.size();
204  std::vector<Vector> corners;
205  corners.reserve(nCorners);
206  for (auto v: verts) {
207  corners.emplace_back(m_grid->getVertex(v));
208  }
209  auto nc = faceNormalAndCenter(corners.size(), &corners[0]);
210  auto normal = nc.first;
211  auto center = nc.second;
212 
213  const Scalar cosa = normal.dot(m_dir);
214  if (std::abs(cosa) <= 1e-7) {
215  return true;
216  }
217  const Scalar t = normal.dot(center-m_p0)/cosa;
218  if (t < 0 || t > 1) {
219  return true;
220  }
221  const auto isect = m_p0 + t*m_dir;
222  if (insidePolygon(isect, corners.data(), nCorners, normal)) {
223  intersections.emplace_back(isect, elem);
224  }
225  }
226  return true;
227  }
228  const Grid *m_grid;
229  const Vector m_p0;
230  const Vector m_dir;
231  const bool m_acceptGhost;
232  struct Intersection {
233  Vector point;
234  Index cell;
235  };
236  std::vector<Intersection> intersections;
237 };
238 
239 }
240 #endif
